scripts.clean: npm run clean:dist && if exist "node_modules" rd /s /q "node_modules"
scripts.debug: npm run clean:dist && npm install && npm run lint && mkdir Client\dist && npm run static && npm run css && npm run js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm install && npm run lint && mkdir Client\dist && npm run static:min && npm run css:min && npm run js:min
scripts.static:min: npm run static && place Client\dist\index.html index.css index.min.css && place Client\dist\index.html main.js main.min.js
scripts.js:min: npm run js && babili Client\dist\main.js > Client\dist\main.min.js && del Client\dist\main.js
